title: Authentication vs Authorization

content_blocks.title: Authentication vs Authorization

content.text: This lesson covers Authentication, Authorization, AAA model, Access Control. You'll learn the fundamentals and practical applications.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Think of this like Authentication in everyday life...
content_blocks.real_world_connection: In real-world scenarios, Authentication is used daily by security professionals.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What questions do you have about this topic?

post_assessment.question: What is authentication?
post_assessment.explanation: Authentication is the process of verifying WHO you are (identity), not what you can do.

post_assessment.question: Which is an example of authorization?
post_assessment.explanation: File permissions determine WHAT you can do (authorization), not WHO you are.
